# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it could be even more beneficial to you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
